dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine has been utilized in various healthcare areas to achieve better patient outcomes lower costs of providing services and increase patient access to care Tele intensive care unit ICU technology has been introduced as a way to provide effective ICU services to patients with reduced access as well as to decrease costs and improve patient care
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Expanding technology in the ICU: the case for the utilization of telemedicine.
